name: Nezera
description:
A four months school project on the theme of Isolation.

You will play as a high mountain guide, and will be isolated inside of   undiscovered ruins, with a group of people that you will have to get to know.

Nezera has both a puzzle and a management phase, in which you’ll have to discover with your new mates  the secrets of these ruins.

Benoit  DeneauxLead Project, Level Design, Scenario, Game DesignPaul Lyaudet
